name: Medieval favours
description:
__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.

Welcome to a magical world full of-!!! *Sighs* Who am i kidding? This place is not very magical... but maybe you can still have an adventure in it! Meet some wierd af characters in this world that was totally not inspired in different  IP's like Dave the Barbarian, Shrek and the Office! Can you help them with the favours they need?

Medieval Favours is a game made by scratch on Unity, so if you find any bug please comment <3 

__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.__.

Welcome to our little project entry for the #NaNoRenO2021 jam!

We would like to thank the awesome voice actors who helped us for this project! Go check them out!

Voice Acting:

The Wizard:  PawPaw Greg Gidney

The Sphynx:  Jasmine "Katy133" Osler  @JKaty133

The Salamander: Mike Young  @MikeYoungVO

The Minotaur and The Tiefling: Gale Rivera 

The Tengu: Nick Chang

The Gargoyle: @VoicesOfNina Nina Nikolic

Let's thank the team! 

Game Dev and UI design: Satoshi Waku

Script and Design: Alev Ykehara

Art: La Parkita

And thank you all for playing this game!

We will release a version without bugs in the future! If you find any bug please comment it as detailed as you can.

Drag and drop the objects you find onto your little bag at the top-left part of the screen! When you think you will need it, click the object, it will appear on the scene on your right, click and drag it to the characther or other object you want it to interact with!

You can also change certain objects in the arts and craft table that you will encounter in the game, think of it as cheap and artsy alchemy.
